scripts.prestart: npm run build && func extensions install
scripts.start: npm run start:host & npm run watch
scripts.setup-and-run: npm install typescript && (npm run build & node init-local-settings.js) && func extensions install && (start http://localhost:7072/api/monitor & func start)
scripts.build-and-copy: npm run build && func extensions install && node copy-build-artifacts.js
